How To Get Your Maxspeed (uTorrent)

Torrent Client - Preferences - Bandwidth - Number of connections - Set aprox. 500 for each

Stop Other Active Torrents - Start downloading and wait for connections.

If there ever was a game that defined the word epic in gaming, well it is crysis 2. It surpasses all your expectations and by such an enormous amount that you actually end up thinking - " Is it real?". One day you are playing a game like homefront, which has setup a precedent in the market for lack of innovation and pathetic graphics, and then suddenly you start playing Crysis 2. Well, its like a breath of fresh air and its so damn pleasing to the eyes. Well hats off to people at crytek for creating cryengine3... Wish there were more games like Crysis... God bless you Crytek.. Wish I had a pc powerful enough to run Crysis2 :) Still, loving it on Xbox also... :)

Hi guys im kinda new to burning xbox games but here goes.

I got my xbox modded, since then i have downloaded a bunch of games some work straight away but recently (including this game) it doesnt load into the games it just goes to a xbox screen as if im trying to play a dvd... ANY HELP WOULD BE MUCH APPRECIATED.

@ wingus.

1) make sure your xbox is flashed with the latest iextreme lt+ firmware
2) download a program called abgx
3) while in abgx go to the autofix tab, set to level 3
4)open the disc image file of whatever game you have downloaded in abgx
5) wait for the game to be stealth patched etc and wait till it has finished. you will be prompted to press any key to exit.
6)go back to the folder containing the games files and now click the and open the  image file.
7)it should automatically open in the program imgburn (im assuming you have this? if not then download imgburn!)
8)put a blank dldvd in you drive hopefully a verbatim disc.
9) hit the burn button and wait for the game to burn........hey presto! a fully functioning new game.
10) MOST IMPORTANTLY! after all steps are complete, raise you middle finger high in the air and shout FUCK YOU MICROSOFT!!!!!!

enjoy ;)
